_comment: This json file contains materials. Materials are a single component, used on their own or in mixtures. They have CAS numbers and some are IFRA restricted (solvents are the exception to this rule).

materials.name: Unknown Material
materials.scent: N/A
materials.usage: Some proprietary mixtures don't list all of their materials (ie. Heliotropex N). In these cases, this material represents the unknown components with no IFRA restrictions.

materials.name: Perfumer's Alcohol
materials.usage: Perfumer's Alcohol (SDA 40B, 190 proof). Commonly used as a fixative for perfume materials.

materials.name: Propylene Glycol
materials.scent: Slightly estery, almost odourless.
materials.usage: Used as a solvent in some cases.

materials.name: Dipropylene Glycol
materials.usage: Dipropylene Glycol (DPG) is practically odorless and used typically for diluting perfume materials.

materials.name: Isopropyl Myristate
materials.usage: Isopropyl Myristate is practically odorless and used typically for diluting perfume materials.

materials.name: Triethyl Citrate
materials.usage: A versatile solvent for oily products, crystals, powders and resins.
materials.scent: Almost odourless with slight hints of mild fruity wine and plum notes.

materials.name: Benzyl Benzoate
materials.usage: A useful solvent for nitro-musks, certain EOs and other very low-polarity ingredients that can be difficult to dissolve.
materials.scent: Faintly balsamic.

materials.name: Triplal
materials.scent: Powerful, green, just-mowed-grass odor. Has the refreshing tartness of bergamot peel.
materials.usage: Great for creating a green accord. It blends beautifully with fruity, citrus, and floral compositions.

materials.name: Ethyl Safranate
materials.scent: Floral, rosy, fruity, apple, spicy scent.
materials.usage: A complex, diffusive, spicy rose note with apple cider and spicy aspects. Used in floral and fruity compositions.

materials.name: Safranal
materials.scent: Saffron, sweet, green, floral, tobacco, with woody and herbal undertones.
materials.usage: Powerful saffron builder.

materials.name: Safraleine
materials.scent: Spicy, leathery, woody, herbal, warm saffron scent.
materials.usage: Exhibits leather and tobacco facets but also has characteristics of spices reminiscent of natural saffron, enriched by rose ketone-like floral aspects.

materials.name: Ionone Alpha
materials.scent: Woody, floral, sweet, orris, violet scent. This is the most floral and most violet-like of all the ionones.
materials.usage: Orris and violet builder.

materials.name: Citronellol
materials.scent: Fresh, floral, clean, rosy, citrusy, piney, slightly fruity scent.
materials.usage: Rose, muguet, geranium builder.

materials.name: Dynascone
materials.scent: Green, galbanum, fruity, pineapple, hyacinth scent.
materials.usage: An extremely powerful and diffusive material useful for fruity, green and floral compositions.

materials.name: Geraniol
materials.scent: Sweet, floral, rosy, fruity, waxy, citrus scent.
materials.usage: Used generally as a sweet floral material of outstanding versatility.

materials.name: Zenolide
materials.scent: Soft, delicate white musk with a red fruit aspect.
materials.usage: Great for creating a clean, soft white musk note. Not extremely noticeable.

materials.name: Cinnamic Alcohol
materials.scent: Sweet, balsam, hyacinth, spicy, green, powdery, and cinnamic.
materials.usage: Cinnamon builder. Also known as Cinnamyl Alcohol.

materials.name: Methyl Isoeugenol
materials.scent: Spicy, clove, woody, earthy, basilic.
materials.usage: Spicy note useful for clove and spice accords and some floral accords. Also known as Methyl Eugenol.

materials.name: Heliotropin
materials.scent: Floral scent, similar to vanilla and cherry. Balsamic and powdery.
materials.usage: Heliotrope, cherry and vanilla builder. Also known as Piperonal. IFRA restriction unknown at this time.

materials.name: Anisaldehyde
materials.scent: Clean anise note.
materials.usage: The main component for numerous floral accords like lilac, hawthorn, anise, honeysuckle, heliotrope, etc.

materials.name: Veratric Aldehyde
materials.scent: Sweet, vanilla, creamy, heliotropee, woody, coumarin.
materials.usage: More warmth and depth than Vanillin, and excellent effect in spicy and woody-musky accords.

materials.name: Acetate C6
materials.scent: Green fruity note reminiscent of apple and pear.
materials.usage: Good blender and modifier for Labdanum. Good for sweet fruity accords. Also known as Hexyl Acetate.

materials.name: Acetate C9
materials.scent: Mild and sweet waxy ingredient that dries down to a green tropical fruity floral.
materials.usage: Adds freshness and diffusion. Also known as Nonyl Acetate.

materials.name: Acetate C12
materials.scent: A refreshing waxy, fruity odor with a citrusy, fruity, fresh, slightly floral aspect.
materials.usage: Also known as Lauryl Acetate or Dodecyl Acetate.

materials.name: Damascone Alpha
materials.scent: A sweet, fruity apple, floral wood with plum and green berry nuances.
materials.usage: Rose, fruit and plum booster.

materials.name: Damascone Beta
materials.scent: Fruity, floral, blackcurrant, plum, rose, honey, tobacco.
materials.usage: A very powerful fruity floral booster.

materials.name: Damascone Delta
materials.scent: A very complex fruity and rosy profile with tobacco, cassis, apple and plum undertones.
materials.usage: Very diffusive plum and rose builder.

materials.name: Damascone Gamma
materials.scent: Fruity, floral, rose, green, cooked apple, plum, tobacco.
materials.usage: Very diffusive plum and rose builder.

materials.name: Terpinene Alpha
materials.scent: Terpy, woody, piney, lemon and lime with spice and mint nuances.
materials.usage: Citrus builder, pine builder, spice builder.

materials.name: Ethyl Propionate
materials.scent: Sweet, fruity, grape, pineapple, rum.
materials.usage: Pineapple builder, rum builder.

materials.name: Allyl Caproate
materials.scent: Fruity-fatty, wine, rum, sweet, pineapple.
materials.usage: Pineapple builder, rum builder, wine builder.

materials.name: Hexalon
materials.scent: Fruity, Pineapple, Woody, Orris. An ionone product having an exceptional rich pineapple quality with natural, oily/waxy undertones.
materials.usage: Pineapple builder.

materials.name: Delphol HC
materials.scent: Green, jasmine, fruity. It is reminiscent of magnolia and tea with slightly fruity undertones.
materials.usage: Tea builder, white floral builder, fruit builder.

materials.name: Citral Dimethyl Acetal
materials.scent: Citrus, verbena note. Has a much milder but more natural lemon odor than Citral.
materials.usage: Citrus builder.

materials.name: Methyl Cinnamic Aldehyde
materials.scent: Floral, soft, sweet, spicy, cinnamon.
materials.usage: Also called Cyprinal. Cinnamon builder.

materials.name: Cinnamyl Acetate
materials.scent: Sweet, floral, spicy, balsam, cinnamon.
materials.usage: Cinnamon builder. Very strong at 5% of concentration.

materials.name: Benzyl Cinnamate
materials.scent: Faintly sweet balsamic cinnamon with floral background.
materials.usage: Cinnamon builder.

materials.name: Eugenol
materials.scent: Sweet, spicy, clove, woody odor.
materials.usage: Clove builder.

materials.name: Benzoic Acid
materials.scent: Faint balsamic odor.
materials.usage: Benzoin builder.

materials.name: Ethanol
materials.scent: Boozy, wine-like odor.
materials.usage: Booze builder.

materials.name: Ethyl Vanillin
materials.scent: Sweet, creamy, vanilla, caramel.
materials.usage: Vanilla builder.

materials.name: Vanillin
materials.scent: Sweet, dry, chocolatey, creamy, aromatic vanilla.
materials.usage: Vanilla builder.

materials.name: Ethyl Heptoate
materials.scent: Fruity pineapple, rum, wine, brandy, cognac, apple peel and berry odor.
materials.usage: Also called Oenanthic Ether. Booze builder. Fruit builder. Diffusive and strong, but not long lasting.

materials.name: Butyl Propionate
materials.scent: Sweet, banana, ripe, bright, lifting, cherry and rum-like odor.
materials.usage: Booze builder. Cherry builder. Banana builder.

materials.name: Cedryl Acetate
materials.scent: Light cedar, vetivert, sweet, woody scent.
materials.usage: Long lasting cedar builder.

materials.name: Vertenex
materials.scent: Sweet, rich, woody, balsamic, orris, creamy scent.
materials.usage: Long lasting cedar builder.

materials.name: Ambercore
materials.scent: A soft, delicate but powerful woody amber note with a natural richness.
materials.usage: Amber builder. Blends well with floral and citrus.

materials.name: Poivrol
materials.usage: Very diffusive. Imparts fresh spicy top note accents, and helps implement the spicy character in agarwood.
materials.scent: Aromatic, pepper, laurel leaf, wood.

materials.name: Isobutyl Quinoline
materials.usage: Resembles certain facets of oakmoss and vetivert and blends very well with them.
materials.scent: Mossy, vetivert, ambery, woody, tobacco-like and leathery. Intense and very high impact odor.

materials.name: Kohinool
materials.scent: Exquisite floral, woody odor with dry, ambery, vetivert, tobacco and raisin nuances.
materials.usage: Amber builder. Also called Amber Carbinol.

materials.name: Datilat
materials.scent: Reminiscent of figs, raisins, dates, grapes, prunes and brandy. Underlines Damascone-like aspects. Provides brandy-like connotations.
materials.usage: Adds a natural fruity twist to floral notes. Raisin, prunt, date, and fig builder. Brandy builder.

materials.name: Symroxane
materials.scent: Woody, vetiver, dried fruit, tobacco scent.
materials.usage: Harmonizes woody and floral elements. Increases radiance and elegance. Imparts damascenone-like effects.

materials.name: Methyl Anthranilate
materials.scent: Musty, fruity and dry floral odor reminiscent of concord grapes.
materials.usage: Used in many types of floral blends such as neroli, orange blossom, exotic compositions, gardenia, tuberose and jasmine.

materials.name: Methyl Diantilis
materials.scent: Spicy, carnation, vanilla, sweet.
materials.usage: An elegant, spicy, sweet ingredient with a similar profile to Isoeugenol, but with an additional powdery aspect.

materials.name: Ethyl Caprate
materials.scent: Sweet, waxy, fruity, apple, grape, oily, brandy.
materials.usage: Booze builder. Grape builder. Apple builder. Also called Ethyl Decanoate.

materials.name: Benzaldehyde
materials.scent: Strong, sharp, sweet, bitter almond, cherry, marzipan, heliotrope, violet.
materials.usage: Cherry builder. Almond builder. Useful with heliotrope and violet accords.

materials.name: Coumarin
materials.scent: Sweet, herbaceous, warm, tonka, somewhat spicy, tobacco, hay-like when diluted.
materials.usage: Hay note, tobacco builder, tonka builder.

materials.name: Isoeugenol
materials.scent: Sweet, spicy, clove, woody, carnation.
materials.usage: Carnation builder, Rose builder, used in oriental and fougere compositions.

materials.name: Tobacarol
materials.usage: Tobacco builder, amber builder.
materials.scent: Dry woody amber-spice combination with a cigar box nuance.

materials.name: Azarbre
materials.scent: Gourmand, Honey, Woody, Orris. Azarbre has a warm honey note with aspects of dried flowers.
materials.usage: Enhances ionones at 2-3% of concentrate. When used at higher dosages up to 10%, it blends the woody and floral components of a fragrance together.

materials.name: Isobutavan
materials.scent: Sweet, and creamy vanillic character reminiscent of white chocolate, cream soda and with a soft apricot feeling.
materials.usage: Less powdery than vanillin and has a more creamy, thickening effect.

materials.name: Dimethyl Benzyl Carbinyl Butyrate
materials.scent: Sweet fruity plum.
materials.usage: Apple, rose and violet builder.

materials.name: Ethylene Brassylate
materials.scent: Musky, powdery, sweet, floral, ambrette-like with woody, spicy and vanilla nuances.
materials.usage: An exceptionally tenacious musk and a good fixative. It plays well with other musks and is best used in combination. Reinforces florals and sweetness.

materials.name: Galaxolide
materials.scent: Musky, floral, woody, clean.
materials.usage: Also called Musk G. A clean, powerful and versatile iso-chroman musk with great persistence and a superb fragrance quality approaching the tone of macrocyclic musks.

materials.name: Violiff
materials.scent: Floral, green, marigold, violet leaf, banana scent.
materials.usage: Violet, violet leaf, marigold and banana builder. Blends well with pineapple and ginger.

materials.name: Iso Amyl Acetate
materials.scent: Sweet, fruity, banana.
materials.usage: Banana builder. Florals support. Very strong.

materials.name: Melonal
materials.scent: Cucumber, melon, green.
materials.usage: Powerful and invaluable in the creation of natural smelling marine and fruity-melon notes.

materials.name: Lilial
materials.scent: Fresh, slightly green, lily, watery.
materials.usage: Also called Lilestralis. Lilac and lily builder. Muguet builder.

materials.name: Hedione
materials.scent: Transparent, floral, jasmine, citrusy scent.
materials.usage: An elegant, transparent jasmine note with a citrus freshness. Creates a natural smoothness and radiance in a wide range of perfume types.

materials.name: Veloutone
materials.scent: A jasmine, lactonic and fruity note reminiscent of peach and apricot with a hint of lavender.
materials.usage: Has exceptional stability and makes a wonderful soft floral note in jasmine, tuberose, honeysuckle, muguet, lilac and fruity accords.

materials.name: Jasmatone
materials.scent: Jasmine, floral, fruity, peachy.
materials.usage: Suitable for jasmine, floral and fruity fragrances.

materials.name: Indolene 50
materials.scent: Animalic, floral, jasmine.
materials.usage: Jasmine builder, useful for extending longevity.

materials.name: Benzyl Acetate
materials.scent: Sweet, floral, fruity, jasmine, fresh odor.
materials.usage: Jasmine and gardenia builder.

materials.name: Decalactone Delta
materials.scent: Sweet, creamy, lactonic, fatty, coconutty, milky.
materials.usage: Milk note builder, coconut builder. Powerful.

materials.name: Octalactone Gamma
materials.scent: Sweet, creamy, dairy, fatty, oily, coconut.
materials.usage: Milk note builder, coconut builder.

materials.name: Dihydrocoumarin
materials.scent: Sweet, creamy, vanilla, coconut, tonka bean, rose, prune.
materials.usage: Milk note builder, coconut builder, vanilla builder.

materials.name: Clarycet
materials.scent: Herbal, sage, floral, rosy, chamomile, dry plum, cedar. More subtle than sage essential oil.
materials.usage: Augments rose ketone notes. Sage builder.

materials.name: Guaiacol
materials.scent: Phenolic, spicy, vanilla, and smoky nuances.
materials.usage: A powerful chemical. It can make a wood smokier, an incense deeper, and it brings out vanilla aspects in other materials when they have it. Deepens phenolic notes in leather accords.

materials.name: Ambrettolide
materials.scent: Musky, ambrette seed, powerful, warm, fruity.
materials.usage: Ambrettolide is a macrocyclic musk with an exceptional diffusion and a very fine character. A superb fixative and highly substantive. Used in trace amounts to great effect.

materials.name: Edenolide
materials.scent: Musky, fruity, apple, floral.
materials.usage: A powdery, creamy, warm, relaxed sensuous white musk with fresh fruity nuances and soft comforting textures.

materials.name: Isoraldeine 95
materials.scent: Orris, violet, floral, buttery, powdery, woody.
materials.usage: Often used in flowery, woody, spicy and amber accords. It brings volume and diffusion to compounds. Also called Methyl Ionone Gamma 95.

materials.name: Allyl Cyclohexyl Propionate
materials.scent: A fruity, waxy, green, sweet, aromatic apple and pineapple scent.
materials.usage: Imparts texture and ripe fruity impressions. Very strong when undiluted.

materials.name: Linalool
materials.scent: Citrus, orange, lemon, floral, waxy, aldehydic and woody scent.
materials.usage: A good general builder. Appears in all kinds of compositions from floral to citrus.

materials.name: Ethyl Maltol
materials.scent: Sweet, caramel, jammy, cotton candy, warm scent.
materials.usage: Gourmand builder. Creates realistic fruit accords with other ester-y materials.

materials.name: Hercolyn D
materials.usage: A fixative and carrier. Very low odor strength. Amber builder.
materials.scent: Amber, cedar and balsam nuances.

materials.name: Vetacetex
materials.scent: Vetiver, woody, earthy, fruity, sweet, dry, fresh scent.
materials.usage: Vetiver builder.

materials.name: Sylvamber
materials.scent: Velvety, woody, amber, dry, cedar scent.
materials.usage: Tenacious and diffusive, similar to Iso E Super.

materials.name: Cetalox
materials.scent: A synthetic ambergris scent that is sweet, dry, musky, and ambery.
materials.usage: Enhanced richness, warmth and depth can be achieved at lower dosages. At higher levels, Cetalox provides exceptional substantivity and performance.

materials.name: Fructone
materials.scent: Apple, strawberry, pineapple, fruity, exotic, tropical, woody with mild sweet pine aspect.
materials.usage: Fructone is useful in fruity compositions and gives a fermented connotation at high dosages. Useful in some rose, aromatic, and green accords.

materials.name: Aprifloren
materials.scent: Fruity, floral, lactonic, green, peach scent.
materials.usage: Adds richness and body to white floral compositions. Excellent diffusivity.

materials.name: Magnolan
materials.scent: Dry, grapefruit, narcissus, peony, muguet, gardenia, geranium scent.
materials.usage: White floral builder. Can be useful as a rose builder as well. Substantive and tenacious.

materials.name: Anisyl Acetone
materials.scent: Sweet dried raspberry, rose, cherry, fruity, cassis absolute scent.
materials.usage: Raspberry, cherry,  heliotrope and rose builder. Long lasting.

materials.name: Cyclabute
materials.scent: Fruity, pineapple, cocoa, peach, mango, herbal, balsamic, ambery scent.
materials.usage: Fruity top note with amber and chocolate nuances.

materials.name: Bicyclononalactone
materials.scent: Powdery, sweet, tonka bean, almond, vanilla, coumarin, hay, coconut.
materials.usage: A coumarin alternative that is more stable. It also has a very good tonka bean characteristic.

materials.name: Nectaryl
materials.scent: Fruity, peach, apricot, lactonic scent.
materials.usage: Peach and apricot builder. Floral support.

materials.name: Methyl Benzoate
materials.scent: Pungent, heavy, sweet, tuberose, slight wintergreen, nutty, bitter, prune and blackcurrant scent.
materials.usage: Used with ylang ylang, oakmoss, sandalwood, vetiver and musks.

materials.name: Jessemal
materials.scent: Floral, jasmine, earthy, parsley, spicy scent.
materials.usage: A good jasmine note, extremely rich and stable.

materials.name: Anisyl Alcohol
materials.scent: Sweet, floral, hawthorn, lilac, jasmine, mimosa, heliotrope, powdery, vanilla, balsamic scent.
materials.usage: Very useful in lilac, apple blossom, pea, gardenia, jasmine and heliotrope accords.

materials.name: Methyl Cyclo Pentenolone
materials.scent: Caramel, maple syrup, sweet, burnt, coffee, woody, nutty, bready scent.
materials.usage: Also called maple lactone. Coffee builder. Caramel builder. Gourmand builder. Powerful when undiluted.
